page.title: 08OUNDLE TEENAGERS AT LEISURE!
page.content: The main entertainment in Oundle has to be the pubs.There are 7 pubs in Oundle:The Ship Inn,The Rose and Crown,The Talbot (which is also a hotel), The Riverside,The Angel Inn,The Black Horse and The George. Teenagers though are unable to purchase alcohol until they are 18.Many teenagers however spend more time in the cafe.They can attend fortnightly discos at the Victoria Hall and can belong to the Oundle youth club,which runs twice a week.Tuesday nights is 14+ and Thursday nights 9-13. There are also several sports clubs.The sports include rugby,football and cricket.There is no cinema.For this and other entertainments teenagers need to travel to nearby larger towns such as Peterborough.
